definition: pitchpipe, pitch standard, one of the twelve semitones in the traditional tone system
surname Song/the Song dynasty (960-1279)/also Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479)

sentences.english: An island of the west-central Philippines south of Luzon. It was first visited by Spaniards in1570.
sentences.chinese: 民都洛岛菲律宾中西部一岛屿，位于吕宋岛以南。

sentences.english: Suddenly, by September 4, 2011 Luzon was under water, and this is worsening.
sentences.chinese: 突然吕宋岛就沉到水下了，而且情况正在恶化。

sentences.english: Typhoon Mindulle took 30 lives and left 12 missing in Luzon.
sentences.chinese: 这场风灾在吕宋岛，造成三十人丧生，十二人失踪。

sentences.english: From 5:00 through the South Luzon Expressway to here only 45 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 从阿拉蒙经由南吕宋岛高速公路到这里仅需45分钟。

sentences.english: A member of any of several peoples of the mountains of northern Luzon in the Philippines.
sentences.chinese: 主要居住在棉兰老岛周围的吕宋岛的一部分菲律宾人。

sentences.english: Half of Luzon, the capital island of the Philippines, disappeared under water.
sentences.chinese: 菲律宾首都吕宋岛，一半消失在海水之中。

sentences.english: With this agreement, the rebellion ended on the island of Luzon.
sentences.chinese: 依据这个协议，吕宋岛的反叛结束了。

sentences.english: A lake of southwest Luzon, Philippines, south of Manila. It contains Volcano Island, the site of the active volcano Mount Taal.
sentences.chinese: 塔阿尔湖菲律宾吕宋岛西南部，位于马尼拉以南。

sentences.english: East coast ports in Luzon, Philippines.
sentences.chinese: 菲律宾吕宋岛东南岸港口。

definition: Kalimantan island (Indonesian name for Borneo island)

pinyin: Ma3 li3 ya4 na4 Qun2 dao3

definition: Sumatra, one of the Indonesian islands
Borneo island (of Indonesia, Malaysia and Brunei)
